name: Queen of the Hill
description:
Enter your name at the mainmenu screen, so you will see who gets the highscore. (Menu is scaled only for 1920x1080, will update)

In game, use mouseclicks to kill the wasps and collect the ant coins and parts. 

Hold R and click the trench you want to repair. 3 ants per trench will keep it clean. If no ants are left, you will have to repair the full trench (side bar). Check if you pick up enough parts to repair. If you forgot to pick up parts and they disappeared, you can buy new workers from the side bar. Holding D will also repair in screen.

Team GLAZE existed of:

Diana van der Schouw (Lead Artist)
Gaspar Viragos (Lead Designer/UI)
Machteld Dalhuisen (Lead Programmer)
Mark de Haan (Designer/Programmer/...)
Omorian Clifford (Music scores/Audio and additional UI Art)
